Tim Draper Reveals Crucial Bullish Nuance About Bitcoin: Details

Tim Draper นักลงทุนที่มีชื่อเสียงได้ออกมาสนับสนุนชุมชน crypto ในขณะที่ราคา Bitcoin ดิ่งลงสู่ระดับ $70,000 เขามองว่าการแกว่งตัวลงของตลาดคือโอกาสที่เป็นรูปธรรมและเน้นย้ำว่านักลงทุนควรมุ่งเน้นการลงทุนระยะยาวมากกว่าความผันผวนในระยะสั้น Draper ยังโต้แย้งว่า Bitcoin ยังคงดีกว่าระบบการเงินแบบดั้งเดิม เนื่องจากมีความปลอดภัยมากกว่าธนาคารและการใช้จ่ายของรัฐบาลที่เกินตัว ในทางกลับกัน Samson Mow ซีอีโอของ JAN3 ยืนยันว่า Bitcoin ในปัจจุบันมีมูลค่าต่ำกว่าที่ควรจะเป็นแม้จะขาดทุนเมื่อเร็วๆ นี้ เขาอ้างว่าหากอิงจากการติดตามดัชนี S&P 500 และแบบจำลอง power law ราคา BTC ควรจะอยู่ที่ระดับ $110,000 ถึง $120,000 Mow เชื่อว่า bear market กำลังจะสิ้นสุดลงและมองว่าพฤติกรรมของตลาดในปัจจุบันเกิดจากการอยู่ในช่วงปลายของยุคสกุลเงิน fiat

EN

Renowned investor Tim Draper has voiced support for the crypto community as Bitcoin prices plummeted to the $70,000 level. He described the market downturn as a "palpable" opportunity, emphasizing that investors should focus on the long term rather than short-term volatility. Draper also argued that Bitcoin remains superior to traditional financial systems, citing it as more secure than "leaking banks" and government overspending. Meanwhile, Samson Mow, CEO of JAN3, asserted that Bitcoin is currently undervalued despite recent losses. He claimed that based on S&P 500 tracking and power law models, BTC should be trading around $110,000 to $120,000. Mow suggested the bear market is ending and attributed the current market behavior to the late stages of the fiat currency era.

Key Points

  • Tim Draper sees a buying opportunity as Bitcoin drops to $70,000, advocating for a long-term strategy.
  • Draper claims Bitcoin is more secure than traditional banks and government spending.
  • Samson Mow argues Bitcoin is undervalued and should be trading around $110,000 based on S&P 500 comparisons.
  • Mow suggests the bear market is concluding and attributes market dynamics to the late stages of fiat currency.

Tim Draper, a renowned investor in major technology companies and an early Bitcoin supporter, has taken to his X social media page to support the crypto community amid the current BTC market bloodbath. He revealed a crucial bullish nuance about the world’s largest cryptocurrency while Bitcoin has dived to the $70,000 price level. You Might Also Like HOT Stories Key bullish Bitcoin nuance revealed by Draper Draper is known for his frequent Bitcoin statements and bullish BTC price predictions. Over the past five years, he has been stating that the bellwether cryptocurrency is likely to soar to $250,000 in the next year. None of his predictions have come true so far; the highest BTC reached to date was $126,198 per coin in October of last year. However, over the past week, it has crashed by nearly 20%, falling from $90,000 to the $70,000 level. In today’s tweet, Tim Draper claimed that Bitcoin presents investors with a “palpable” opportunity. Draper also reminded the crypto community that one should only bet on BTC in the long run: “The bitcoin opportunity is palpable. In it for the long haul.” He also believes that Bitcoin is a lot better and more secure than what “leaking banks” and overspending governments can offer. The #bitcoin opportunity is palpable. In it for the long haul. Waaay better and more secure than trusting leaky banks and spending governments. — Tim Draper (@TimDraper) February 4, 2026 Bitcoin should be at $0.11 million now: Samson Mow In a recent tweet, Bitcoin maximalist and CEO of JAN3 Samson Mow claimed that the bear market, which Bitcoin has been facing since 2025, is about to end. Mow reminded his audience about the $126,000 all-time high reached by BTC last year, pointing out that it would have been impossible in a bear market. The idea of a bear market, he said, is “an over-simplistic take on the entire macro situation.” Mow said that since the start of 2025, Bitcoin has been down against all the major market assets — gold, M2 expansion and the S&P 500. BTC is showing the largest drop against gold, 58%. In January 2026, gold surged to a new all-time high above $5,000 per ounce but then collapsed by 30%. If we tracked the S&P from 2025 to now, Bitcoin should be at $0.11M. Let’s not even bother with the gold calculation. @david_eng_mba ’s analysis states fair market value according to power law is $0.12M. Bitcoin is incredibly undervalued at these levels. — Samson Mow (@Excellion) February 4, 2026 Mow believes that the situation on the markets is not normal. Believing that we live “in the late stages of fiat,” anything can happen to anything, he said. Under normal conditions, he tweeted, Bitcoin should be trading at around $0.11 million today. As for gold, it should be trading at $0.17 million per ounce, according to the power law, Mow said.
